name: Out in time
description:
I started a course in a school to learn blueprint programing. In the end we had to come up with a mini project of our own. In my case I wanted to create a game that could challenge  everything I learned through the course. I decided to create a scape game, where you have to scape from a jail and every level woul have a diferente mechanic and way of playing.

Following the development, here is the link to part one of my devlog uploaded to youtube.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R5Yvsyd8KN0&t=250s
